thread.title: Kaley Cuoco shares message of thanks to fans
thread.title_full: Kaley Cuoco shares message of thanks to fans - UPI.com

author: Marilyn Malara
title: Kaley Cuoco shares message of thanks to fans
text:
1 of 2 | License Photo LOS ANGELES, Oct. 22 (UPI) -- Kaley Cuoco took time to thank fans on social media for their ongoing support after announcing her divorce from Ryan Sweeting .
The Big Bang Theory actress re-posted a heartfelt image featuring Winnie the Pooh and Piglet Wednesday, using the opportunity to express her gratitude.
"I'm feeling completely overwhelmed with the outpouring of kindness and support from the people that surround me and from those I have never even met," she wrote on Instagram. "I want you to know, I read all your comments and your sweet words have touched me deeply. I'm incredibly grateful for all your love as I start this next chapter in my life."
The accompanying image, an A.A. Milne illustration, includes the message, "Piglet noticed that even though he had a Very Small Heart, it could hold a rather large amount of Gratitude."
Cuoco's net-based thank you note comes a little under a month since she and Sweeting announced their split after 21 months of marriage. Sweeting, a former professional tennis player, is reportedly seeking spousal support from Cuoco, who has been named the top-earning woman in television this year.
The actress also shot down recent reports she was dating Big Bang Theory co-star and ex-lover Johny Galecki, writing on Instagram they are only "the best of buds."
I'm feeling completely overwhelmed with the outpouring of kindness and support from the people that surround me and from those I have never even met. I want you to know, I read all your comments and your sweet words have touched me deeply. I'm incredibly grateful for all your love as I start this next chapter in my life ðŸ’— ðŸ’—
